name: Vro
wishText: May your dreams shine as brightly as you do! :)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to the most amazing sister ever!! Sending you loads of love and joy!
text2: That's what I was going to say.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Hope you loved it! Can't wait to celebrate together. ğŸ’•
